headline: USON 1100
description: Leak, Flow and Function Test System
specstable:
Manufacturer Uson
Model 1100
Description Leak, Flow and Function Test System
Accessories

Leak rate calibration kit

Other Information

Touch screen
Fixture seal test function
Pressure and flow plot graph
Five test programs with step editing
Program and data storage on PCMCIA card
CE label
Installed options:

  • I/O port
  • RS 232 port
  • Parallel port
  • Program storage
  • HI sensitivity
  • Dual transducers 0 to 5 Lbs and o to 1 Lb
Condition Very Good
Year of Manufacture 1999
Exterior Dimensions
Width 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
Depth 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
Height 7.000 in (17.8 cm)
